metadata.title: CVE-2016-9389 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description:
The jpc_irct and jpc_iict functions in jpc_mct.c in JasPer before 1.900.14allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (assertion failure).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9389` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjasper-runtime - 1.900.1-14ubuntu3.5
libjasper1 - 1.900.1-14ubuntu3.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jasper package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.900.1-14ubuntu3.5').
